bug.author: jzazo
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
Attribute not accessible from trainer: <denchmark-link:https://pytorch-lightning.readthedocs.io/en/latest/trainer.html#log-dir>Documentation</denchmark-link> indicates this should be accessible. <denchmark-h:h3>The BoringModel: click here</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Call trainer.log_dir. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Should return current experiment log_dir.

comments.comment: Hi! thanks for your contribution!, great first issue!

is not available on the 1.0.8 release. You are looking at the <denchmark-link:https://pytorch-lightning.readthedocs.io/en/latest/trainer.html#log-dir>latest docs</denchmark-link> and not the <denchmark-link:https://pytorch-lightning.readthedocs.io/en/stable/trainer.html#log-dir>stable ones</denchmark-link> . They are available on master. You can install it using: <denchmark-code>pip install git+https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning.git -U </denchmark-code>
